# Natural Language Processing

> Standard library natural language processing (NLP).

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var nlp = require( '@stdlib/nlp' );
```

#### nlp

Standard library natural language processing (NLP).

```javascript
var fcns = nlp;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
